Articles.Content:
Hello!

I decided to finally sign up for these forums. I enjoy this game very much and have a strong interest in the cosmos. More importantly, I am terrible at this game. I hope to learn some while on these forums because I must be missing something while watching youtube tutorials.

In my past time I enjoy taking photos, making music and creating graphics on photoshop. Maybe I can bring a few of my skills and help someone with a mod in the future. I would really like to help create some custom music for the game (but it seems that this is nearly impossible from what I looked up).

I look forward to meeting more of you around the forums.

Have a good day and new year!
Hello Aningaaq. This is a good place to look for tips, or post questions of your own.
